title: NI 7Spr Hand SHWR Head
description: Experience a better shower with the control and flexibility of a Delta hand shower. Great for showering yourself or your loved ones and pets, as well as for keeping your shower and tub clean. Delta SpotShield Technology helps to keep your faucet or shower cleaner, longer by resisting water spots and fingerprints. Keep your space spotless with SpotShield Technology, available across a variety of finishes for the kitchen and bath. While other products may gather unsightly mineral build-up over time, Delta soft rubber Touch-Clean spray holes allow any mineral residue to simply be wiped away for an instantly refreshed look with no need for soaking or the aid of chemical cleaners. The pause setting gives you ample space for shaving, lathering and other shower tasks, then easily restarts the water with the temperature where you left off. This spray setting helps you conserve water, so you can worry less about depleting your supply of hot water - and you help the environment too. Delta WaterSense labeled faucets, showers and toilets use at least 20% less water than the industry standard saving you money without compromising performance. Ergonomic, non-slip handle for comfort and convenience Smooth, brushed nickel finish creates a clean look that complements any style Fits standard 1/2 in. pipe Meets water sense criteria for water conservation without sacrificing performance Easy-turn spray dial for setting selection Includes 60 in. hose for extended reach and easy maneuverability 7 spray settings include wide full, drenching full, standard full, massage, full with massage, energy saving and trickle for a custom experience Product Type: Handheld Showerhead Shower Head Type: Single Shower Head Shape: Round Spray Pattern: Full,Massage Shower Head Size: Medium Shower Head Mounting Type: Wall Mount Included Components: Hand Shower Features: No Additional Featur
